page_analysis.text_content:
Allowable daylight plane protrusions summary

Feature                                    Allowable protrusion                           Illustration

Television and radio antennas              up to 15' above maximum building
                                          height

Chimneys and flues < 5' wide              may extend beyond the daylight plane to        Fig 20 on p. 26
                                          meet minimum required clearance of
                                          Building Code (Chapter 16.04)

Dormers, roof decks, gabels, or similar    each feature ≤ 7.5' long and cumulative       Fig 20 on p. 26 &
architectural features                     length of all features ≤ 15' with min 5'      Fig 23 on p. 28
                                          separation between features (on each
                                          side); height ≤ 24';

Cornices, eaves, and similar architectural max 2'                                         Fig 22 on p. 27
features (excluding flat or continuous walls
or enclosures usable for interior space)

29

visual_elements.description: A three-column table showing Feature, Allowable protrusion, and Illustration columns. The table contains four rows of data about different building features and their allowable protrusions from daylight planes.

additional_notes: Page number 29 appears at bottom right
Document appears to be a photocopied page from a technical manual

qualifiers.text: excluding flat or continuous walls or enclosures usable for interior space

conditions.text: may extend beyond the daylight plane to meet minimum required clearance of Building Code (Chapter 16.04)
conditions.threshold_value: minimum required clearance of Building Code (Chapter 16.04)

conditions.text: min 5' separation between features (on each side)

logical_relationships.expression: each feature ≤ 7.5' long and cumulative length of all features ≤ 15' with min 5' separation between features (on each side); height ≤ 24'

execution_sequence.action: Verify chimney or flue width is less than 5 feet
Check compliance with Building Code clearance requirements for chimneys and flues
Evaluate all dimensional requirements for dormers and similar features
Verify cornices and eaves do not exceed maximum protrusion and meet exclusion criteria
